brief_summary.textblock:
This trial is going to evaluate the value of blood-oxygen functional imaging technology in
      the diagnosis of breast diseases.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Application of Breast Blood-oxygen Functional Imaging Technology

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  female older than 18 years breast lump received breast ultrasound and mammography

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  After core-needle biopsy or resection After neoadjuvant chemotherapy, radiotherapy or
             endocrine therapy

study_pop.textblock: Female with breast lump, received breast ultrasound and mammography

facility.name: Department of Breast Imaging, Tianjin Medical University Cancer Hospital

clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Application of Breast Blood-oxygen Functional Imaging Technology

overall_official.affiliation: Department of Breast Imaging, Tianjin Medical University Cancer Hospital

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Case-Only, Time Perspective: Prospective
